title: Group portrait of Ebenezer Baptist Church basketball team, including Supervisor Jodie West wearing dark suit on left, Assistant Coach William Grant second from left, Head Coach William Monroe wearing dark jacket on right end, Melvin Jackson third from right, and Dennis Johnson squatting second from right, posed in Centre Avenue YMCA, another version
credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Charles "Teenie" Harris
provenance_text: Pittsburgh Courier Photographic Archives, Pittsburgh, PA
